Reviews.Title: “Single woman in ideal hotel”
Reviews.Author: FriedaOrlan
Reviews.Content: recommend hotel highly staff helpful virtually spanish speaker woman spent trip staying family ideal hotel business people conference delegate practically attached banks change money 24 hour store called subway nearest metro university taxi onto metro network 15 pence cheapest fastest mexico city walking distance taxis outside hotel food marvellous breakfast buffet huge variety food including mexican specialities treat wonderful views city fantastic hotel
